leaf_cluster.leaf_cluster_name: 生信-变异检测与基因分型生态
leaf_cluster.tool_form: CLI + 评测套件 + 数据集

queries: [WEB] copy number variation detection algorithms github
[WEB] best SV CNV callers bioinformatics github
[WEB] long read structural variation caller github

tools.name: AmpliconSuite-pipeline
tools.one_line_profile: Pipeline for AmpliconArchitect to detect CNVs and focal amplifications
tools.detailed_description: A quickstart tool for AmpliconArchitect. Enables all steps (alignment, CNV calling, seed interval detection) prior to running AmpliconArchitect, and invokes AmpliconClassifier.

tools.name: HMZDelFinder
tools.one_line_profile: CNV calling algorithm for homozygous/hemizygous deletions in WES data
tools.detailed_description: CNV calling algorithm for detection of homozygous and hemizygous deletions from whole exome sequencing data.

tools.name: Control-FREEC
tools.one_line_profile: Copy number and genotype annotation tool for WGS/WES data
tools.detailed_description: Control-FREEC: Copy number and genotype annotation in whole genome and whole exome sequencing data.

tools.name: DeepSV
tools.one_line_profile: Deep learning based tool for deletion calling
tools.detailed_description: Calling deletions using deep convolutional neural networks.

tools.name: SMRTSV2
tools.one_line_profile: Structural variant caller for long-read sequencing data
tools.detailed_description: Structural variant caller designed for PacBio SMRT sequencing data, developed by Eichler Lab.

tools.name: aCNViewer
tools.one_line_profile: Genome-wide visualization of absolute copy number variations
tools.detailed_description: Comprehensive genome-wide visualization of absolute copy number and copy neutral variations.

tools.name: SV_10X_analysis
tools.one_line_profile: Structural variation analysis tools for 10X Genomics data
tools.detailed_description: Structural variation analysis of 10X Genomics linked-read data.

tools.name: TDScope
tools.one_line_profile: Somatic structural variation caller for long-read data
tools.detailed_description: A somatic structural variation caller based on long-read technology.

tools.name: sv-callers
tools.one_line_profile: Snakemake workflow for structural variant detection
tools.detailed_description: Snakemake-based workflow for detecting structural variants in genomic data.

tools.name: SVsim
tools.one_line_profile: Synthetic Structural Variant generator for benchmarking
tools.detailed_description: SVsim: a tool that generates synthetic Structural Variant calls as benchmarks to test/evaluate SV calling pipelines.

tools.name: CNVizard
tools.one_line_profile: Web-based tool for visualizing germline CNVs
tools.detailed_description: Browser-based tool for visualizing and analyzing germline copy number variants in genomic data.

tools.name: Canvas
tools.one_line_profile: Copy number variant calling tool from Illumina
tools.detailed_description: Canvas - Copy number variant (CNV) calling from DNA sequencing data.

tools.name: Manta
tools.one_line_profile: Structural variant and indel caller for mapped sequencing data
tools.detailed_description: Structural variant and indel caller for mapped sequencing data, optimized for speed and accuracy.

tools.name: HandyCNV
tools.one_line_profile: R package for CNV summary, annotation, and visualization
tools.detailed_description: An R package for Standardized Summary, Annotation, Comparison, and Visualization of CNV, CNVR and ROH.

tools.name: ProjectSVR
tools.one_line_profile: R package for reference mapping and visualization
tools.detailed_description: A package for reference mapping and nice visualization, likely focused on structural variation analysis.

tools.name: ClinSV
tools.one_line_profile: Clinical structural and copy number variation detection
tools.detailed_description: Robust detection of clinically relevant structural and copy number variation from whole genome sequencing data.

tools.name: Severus
tools.one_line_profile: Somatic structural variant caller using long reads
tools.detailed_description: A tool for somatic structural variant calling using long reads.

tools.name: hapdiff
tools.one_line_profile: Structural variant calling for diploid assemblies
tools.detailed_description: SV calling for diploid assemblies, enabling haplotype-resolved variant detection.

tools.name: Ribbon
tools.one_line_profile: Genome browser for complex structural variants and long reads
tools.detailed_description: A visualization tool designed to display complex structural variants and long-read sequencing alignments, helping researchers inspect genomic rearrangements.

tools.name: DeNovoSV
tools.one_line_profile: Pipeline for calling de novo structural variants from trio Nanopore data
tools.detailed_description: A bioinformatics pipeline designed to identify de novo structural variants in trio families using Nanopore long-read sequencing data.

tools.name: MoCCA-SV
tools.one_line_profile: Ensemble framework for structural variant analysis
tools.detailed_description: A flexible ensemble framework that integrates multiple structural variant callers to improve detection accuracy and analysis.

tools.name: DeepDock
tools.one_line_profile: Geometric Deep Learning for predicting molecular binding conformations
tools.detailed_description: A geometric deep learning approach to predict the binding conformations of bioactive molecules, useful in drug discovery and molecular modeling.

tools.name: HiFiCNV
tools.one_line_profile: Copy number variant caller for PacBio HiFi reads
tools.detailed_description: A tool for calling copy number variants (CNVs) and visualizing depth coverage specifically designed for PacBio HiFi sequencing data.

tools.name: SVTopo
tools.one_line_profile: Complex structural variant visualization for HiFi sequencing data
tools.detailed_description: A utility for visualizing complex structural variant topologies using PacBio HiFi reads.

tools.name: pbsv
tools.one_line_profile: PacBio structural variant calling and analysis tool
tools.detailed_description: The official structural variant caller for PacBio reads, capable of identifying insertions, deletions, inversions, duplications, and translocations.

tools.name: svpack
tools.one_line_profile: Structural variant analysis and filtering tools
tools.detailed_description: A collection of tools for filtering, comparing, and processing structural variant calls in VCF format.

tools.name: StructuralVariantAnnotation
tools.one_line_profile: R package for structural variant analysis
tools.detailed_description: An R package designed to simplify the analysis and manipulation of structural variant calls, providing infrastructure for breakpoint annotation.

tools.name: GRIDSS
tools.one_line_profile: Genomic Rearrangement IDentification Software Suite
tools.detailed_description: A high-sensitivity structural variant caller that detects genomic rearrangements using a combination of assembly, split-read, and read-pair evidence.

tools.name: CopywriteR
tools.one_line_profile: DNA copy number detection from off-target sequence data
tools.detailed_description: A tool for detecting DNA copy number variations (CNVs) by utilizing off-target sequence data from targeted sequencing experiments.

tools.name: lm-spanish
tools.one_line_profile: Spanish Language Models and resources
tools.detailed_description: A collection of Spanish language models and resources developed for Natural Language Processing research.

tools.name: cue
tools.one_line_profile: Deep learning framework for SV calling and genotyping
tools.detailed_description: A deep learning-based framework designed for the calling and genotyping of structural variants from sequencing data.

tools.name: CNView
tools.one_line_profile: Visualization and annotation of CNVs
tools.detailed_description: A tool for the visualization and annotation of Copy Number Variants (CNVs) derived from population-scale whole-genome sequencing data.

tools.name: DeviCNV
tools.one_line_profile: Detection and Visualization of Exon-Level CNVs
tools.detailed_description: A tool for detecting and visualizing exon-level Copy Number Variants in targeted Next Generation Sequencing data.

tools.name: sigminer
tools.one_line_profile: Toolkit for genomic alteration signature analysis
tools.detailed_description: An R toolkit for the analysis and visualization of genomic alteration signatures (mutational signatures), supporting various genomic data types.

tools.name: MantaRay
tools.one_line_profile: Grasshopper plugin to connect with Radiance through SSH
tools.detailed_description: A plugin for Grasshopper that facilitates connection to Radiance for lighting simulation and analysis via SSH.

tools.name: ConanVarvar
tools.one_line_profile: Tool for detection of large syndromic copy number variation from WGS data
tools.detailed_description: ConanVarvar is a versatile tool designed for the detection of large syndromic copy number variations (CNVs) from whole genome sequencing data, specifically targeting clinical diagnostics.

tools.name: SVPV
tools.one_line_profile: Structural Variant Prediction Viewer for visualizing SVs
tools.detailed_description: SVPV (Structural Variant Prediction Viewer) is a tool for visualizing structural variants to assist in the manual curation and verification of SV calls.

tools.name: PennCNV
tools.one_line_profile: Copy number variation detection from SNP genotyping arrays
tools.detailed_description: PennCNV is a software tool for Copy Number Variation (CNV) detection from SNP genotyping arrays. It uses a Hidden Markov Model (HMM) that integrates multiple sources of information.

tools.name: intansv
tools.one_line_profile: R package for integrative analysis and visualization of structural variations
tools.detailed_description: intansv is an R package designed for the integrative analysis of structural variations (SVs). It provides functions for reading SV predictions from various software, annotating them with genomic elements, and visualizing the results.

tools.name: NGS_SV_CNV_Pipeline
tools.one_line_profile: Pipeline for germline and somatic SV/CNV detection and annotation
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive genome Structural Variants Detection and Annotation Pipeline developed by ABCS at Frederick National Laboratory. It includes QC, detection of both germline and somatic SVs/CNVs, and annotation.

tools.name: CNVnator
tools.one_line_profile: Tool for CNV discovery and genotyping from read depth analysis
tools.detailed_description: CNVnator is a tool for CNV discovery and genotyping from depth-of-coverage by mapped reads. It uses a mean-shift approach with partitioning (circular binary segmentation) to discover CNVs.

tools.name: CNVpytor
tools.one_line_profile: Python extension of CNVnator for CNV analysis from depth-of-coverage
tools.detailed_description: CNVpytor is a Python package and command line tool for CNV analysis from depth-of-coverage by mapped reads, serving as an extension and improvement over CNVnator.

tools.name: SpatialInferCNV
tools.one_line_profile: Tool for clone calling and CNV inference from spatial transcriptomics data
tools.detailed_description: SpatialInferCNV is designed for Clone Calling from Visium Spatial Transcriptomics of Cancer samples, enabling the inference of Copy Number Variations in a spatial context.

tools.name: lumpy-sv
tools.one_line_profile: Probabilistic framework for structural variant discovery
tools.detailed_description: Lumpy is a general probabilistic framework for structural variant discovery. It integrates multiple detection signals (read-pair, split-read, read-depth) to improve sensitivity and specificity.

tools.name: cnvetti
tools.one_line_profile: Robust and efficient clinical CNV calling from HTS data
tools.detailed_description: CNVetti is a tool designed for robust, efficient, and versatile clinical Copy Number Variation (CNV) calling from High-Throughput Sequencing (HTS) data, developed by BIH.

tools.name: BreakSeq2
tools.one_line_profile: Ultrafast nucleotide-resolution analysis of structural variants
tools.detailed_description: BreakSeq2 is an ultrafast and accurate tool for nucleotide-resolution analysis of structural variants. It is designed to detect SVs using a breakpoint mapping strategy.

tools.name: smoove
tools.one_line_profile: Simplified structural variant calling and genotyping pipeline
tools.detailed_description: Smoove simplifies the structural variant (SV) calling and genotyping process by wrapping existing tools like Lumpy and Svtyper. It handles parallelization, file management, and best-practice workflows to produce high-quality SV calls from short-read sequencing data.

tools.name: smoove-nf
tools.one_line_profile: Nextflow implementation of the smoove structural variant calling workflow
tools.detailed_description: A Nextflow pipeline implementing the smoove workflow for structural variant calling. It orchestrates the execution of smoove across samples, providing scalability and reproducibility for large-scale genomic analysis.

tools.name: svpluscnv
tools.one_line_profile: Integrative analysis and visualization of structural variants and copy number variants
tools.detailed_description: An R package designed for the integrative analysis of structural variants (SV) and copy number variants (CNV). It provides functionalities to validate SVs using CNV data, characterize complex events, and visualize the integration of these genomic alterations.

tools.name: benchmark_scrnaseq_cnv_callers
tools.one_line_profile: Benchmarking pipeline for scRNA-seq copy number variant callers
tools.detailed_description: An analysis pipeline developed to benchmark and evaluate the performance of various copy number variant (CNV) calling tools specifically designed for single-cell RNA sequencing (scRNA-seq) data.

tools.name: SVPG
tools.one_line_profile: Pangenome-based structural variation caller
tools.detailed_description: SVPG is a structural variation caller that utilizes pangenome graphs to improve the detection of SVs. It leverages the genetic diversity captured in a pangenome to identify variants that might be missed by reference-based methods.

tools.name: CNVbench
tools.one_line_profile: Benchmarking framework for CNV calling tools
tools.detailed_description: CNVbench is an R package designed to facilitate the benchmarking and comparison of Copy Number Variation (CNV) calling tools, providing metrics and visualizations to assess their performance.

tools.name: BAdabouM
tools.one_line_profile: Genomic structural variations discovery tool
tools.detailed_description: BAdabouM is a tool for discovering genomic structural variations. It is written in C and aims to identify SVs from sequencing data.

tools.name: cloudbreak
tools.one_line_profile: Hadoop-based genomic structural variation caller
tools.detailed_description: Cloudbreak is a structural variation caller designed to run on Hadoop clusters. It leverages distributed computing to process large-scale genomic datasets for SV detection.

tools.name: PyBSASeq
tools.one_line_profile: Bulked Segregant Analysis (BSA) sequence data analysis tool
tools.detailed_description: PyBSASeq is a Python-based tool for analyzing Bulked Segregant Analysis (BSA) sequencing data. It implements a novel algorithm for detecting significant structural variants and quantitative trait loci (QTLs) associated with traits of interest.

tools.name: DELLY
tools.one_line_profile: Integrated structural variant discovery tool
tools.detailed_description: DELLY is an integrated structural variant (SV) prediction method that can discover, genotype, and visualize deletions, tandem duplications, inversions, and translocations at single-nucleotide resolution in short-read massively parallel sequencing data. It uses paired-ends, split-reads, and read-depth to sensitively and accurately delineate genomic rearrangements.

tools.name: Viola-SV
tools.one_line_profile: Analysis and visualization of genomic structural variant signatures
tools.detailed_description: Viola is a Python package designed for the analysis and visualization of genomic structural variant (SV) signatures. It facilitates the interpretation of complex SV patterns and their association with biological processes.

tools.name: cnvkit_pipeline
tools.one_line_profile: Pipeline for copy number calling from WES data using CNVkit
tools.detailed_description: A shell-based pipeline wrapper for CNVkit, specifically tailored for calling copy number variants (CNVs) from Whole Exome Sequencing (WES/WXS) data.

tools.name: VarScan
tools.one_line_profile: Variant calling and somatic mutation/CNV detection
tools.detailed_description: VarScan is a platform-independent mutation caller for targeted, exome, and whole-genome resequencing data generated on Illumina, SOLiD, Life/PGM, Roche/454, and similar instruments. It employs a robust heuristic/statistic approach to call variants (SNVs and indels) and detect somatic mutations and copy number alterations (CNAs) in tumor-normal pairs.

tools.name: SVHunter
tools.one_line_profile: Transformer-based structural variation detection for long reads
tools.detailed_description: SVHunter is a deep learning-based tool that uses a transformer model to detect and genotype structural variations (DEL, INS, DUP, INV, TRA) from long-read sequencing data.

tools.name: SVIM
tools.one_line_profile: Structural Variant Identification Method using Long Reads
tools.detailed_description: SVIM (Structural Variant Identification Method) is a tool for the detection and classification of structural variants from long-read sequencing data (PacBio, Nanopore). It distinguishes between different SV classes including deletions, insertions, inversions, tandem duplications, and translocations.

tools.name: CNV-Z
tools.one_line_profile: Copy number caller for NGS data
tools.detailed_description: CNV-Z is a software tool for detecting copy number variations (CNVs) from next-generation sequencing data, implemented in Julia.

tools.name: CNVkit
tools.one_line_profile: Copy number variant detection from targeted DNA sequencing
tools.detailed_description: CNVkit is a Python library and command-line software toolkit to infer and visualize copy number from high-throughput DNA sequencing data. It is designed for use with hybrid capture, including whole-exome and custom target panels, and takes advantage of off-target reads to improve accuracy.

tools.name: Flowhub CNV
tools.one_line_profile: Copy Number Variation analysis component for Flowhub ecosystem
tools.detailed_description: A component or library designed for detecting or processing Copy Number Variations (CNV), likely within the Flowhub visual programming environment.

tools.name: MosaiCatcher Pipeline
tools.one_line_profile: Workflow for SV calling from single-cell Strand-seq data
tools.detailed_description: An integrated pipeline designed to detect structural variants (SVs) using single-cell Strand-seq data, facilitating the analysis of genomic heterogeneity.

tools.name: SURVIVOR
tools.one_line_profile: Toolset for SV simulation, comparison, and filtering
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive toolset for simulating, comparing, merging, and filtering structural variant (SV) calls from various callers and sequencing technologies.

tools.name: Sniffles
tools.one_line_profile: Structural variation caller for third-generation sequencing data
tools.detailed_description: A structural variation caller designed for long-read sequencing data (PacBio/Oxford Nanopore), capable of detecting various types of SVs with high accuracy.

tools.name: Segment Model Spy
tools.one_line_profile: Interactive visualization tool for GATK CNV analysis
tools.detailed_description: A web-based visualization tool designed to display modeled segments and raw read/allele counts from GATK Copy Number Variation (CNV) analysis results.

tools.name: tso_cnv
tools.one_line_profile: CNV detection for TruSightOne capture data
tools.detailed_description: A specialized tool for detecting copy number variations (CNV) specifically in data generated using the TruSightOne capture panel.

tools.name: svpluscnv
tools.one_line_profile: Integrative analysis of Structural Variants and CNVs
tools.detailed_description: An R package for the integrative analysis of structural variants (SV) and copy number variations (CNV), aiming to provide a comprehensive view of genomic alterations.

tools.name: long-read-validation
tools.one_line_profile: Validation of BEDPE structural variations using long reads
tools.detailed_description: A tool for validating structural variation calls in BEDPE format using long-read sequencing data, helping to assess the quality of SV predictions.

tools.name: ampliCNV
tools.one_line_profile: CNV detection for amplicon-based WES data
tools.detailed_description: A Python package for detecting copy number variations (CNV) in whole exome sequencing (WES) data obtained via amplicon-based enrichment technologies.

tools.name: dev-survivors
tools.one_line_profile: Reliable and interpretable survival analysis library
tools.detailed_description: A Python library dedicated to survival analysis, providing reliable and interpretable models for statistical analysis of time-to-event data.

tools.name: SV-plaudit
tools.one_line_profile: Pipeline for structural variant image curation
tools.detailed_description: A pipeline designed to facilitate the manual curation and analysis of structural variant (SV) candidates by generating and managing visualization images.

tools.name: PopSV
tools.one_line_profile: Population-based detection of structural variation
tools.detailed_description: An R package for detecting structural variations (SVs) from high-throughput sequencing data using population-based methods to improve accuracy.

tools.name: GenomeSyn
tools.one_line_profile: Tool for constructing and visualizing genome synteny
tools.detailed_description: A tool developed for the construction and visualization of genome synteny, aiding in the study of genomic structural variations and comparative genomics.

tools.name: CNVfilteR
tools.one_line_profile: R package to remove false positive CNV calls using SNVs
tools.detailed_description: An R package that leverages single nucleotide variant (SNV) calls to identify and remove false positive copy number variation (CNV) calls from various tools.

tools.name: SVGene
tools.one_line_profile: SVG gene cluster visualization library
tools.detailed_description: A JavaScript library for generating SVG-based visualizations of gene clusters, useful for displaying genomic structures and variations.

tools.name: scSVA
tools.one_line_profile: Single-cell Scalable Visualization and Analytics
tools.detailed_description: A tool for the scalable visualization and analysis of single-cell data, potentially including structural variation analysis in single cells.

tools.name: freec2gistic
tools.one_line_profile: Converter from CONTROL-freec output to GISTIC2 format
tools.detailed_description: A workflow utility to convert copy number calling output from CONTROL-freec into the format required by GISTIC2 for recurrent CNV analysis.

tools.name: x11hts
tools.one_line_profile: X11 related utilities for HTS data visualization
tools.detailed_description: A collection of C++ utilities for visualizing High-Throughput Sequencing (HTS) data using the X11 window system.

tools.name: Aperture
tools.one_line_profile: Alignment-free detection of SVs and viral integrations in ctDNA
tools.detailed_description: A Java-based tool for the alignment-free detection of structural variations and viral integrations, specifically optimized for circulating tumor DNA (ctDNA) analysis.

tools.name: CAISC
tools.one_line_profile: Integration of SNV and CNV for single-cell subclone detection
tools.detailed_description: A software tool to integrate copy number variation (CNV) and single nucleotide mutations (SNV) for genetic heterogeneity profiling and subclone detection using single-cell RNA sequencing data.

tools.name: MARS
tools.one_line_profile: Multiple Samples Alignment-based SV Calling and Refinement
tools.detailed_description: A Python package designed for structural variant (SV) calling and refinement by leveraging multiple sample alignments to improve detection accuracy.

tools.name: VolcanoSV
tools.one_line_profile: Long-read structural variant caller for diploid genomes
tools.detailed_description: A tool for accurate and robust structural variant calling in diploid genomes using single-molecule long-read sequencing data.

tools.name: CallSV
tools.one_line_profile: Long-read SV calling pipeline
tools.detailed_description: A pipeline designed for calling structural variants (SVs) from long-read sequencing data.

tools.name: iPsychCNV
tools.one_line_profile: Copy number variation detection method for dried blood spots using intensity data
tools.detailed_description: iPsychCNV is an R package designed to detect Copy Number Variations (CNVs) from hybridization intensity data, specifically optimized for DNA extracted from dried blood spots (DBS). It addresses the noise and variability inherent in DBS samples.

tools.name: VACmap
tools.one_line_profile: Long-read aligner optimized for complex structural variation discovery
tools.detailed_description: VACmap is a genome alignment tool specifically designed to handle long reads (PacBio/Nanopore) with a focus on improving the detection of complex structural variations (SVs) by preserving alignment information in complex regions.

tools.name: nanopore-SV-analysis
tools.one_line_profile: Scripts for structural variant filtering and analysis of Nanopore WGS data
tools.detailed_description: A collection of Python scripts and workflows for processing, filtering, and analyzing structural variants called from Nanopore human whole-genome sequencing data.

tools.name: colorSV
tools.one_line_profile: Somatic structural variant calling on matched tumor-normal co-assembly graphs
tools.detailed_description: colorSV is a tool for detecting somatic structural variations by analyzing colored de Bruijn graphs constructed from matched tumor-normal sequencing data, enabling precise identification of cancer-specific variants.

tools.name: knotAnnotSV
tools.one_line_profile: Visualization script for AnnotSV structural variant annotations
tools.detailed_description: A lightweight tool to convert AnnotSV output files into customizable HTML reports, facilitating the visualization and interpretation of annotated structural variants.

tools.name: CoNVaDING
tools.one_line_profile: Copy Number Variation Detection In Next-generation sequencing Gene panels
tools.detailed_description: CoNVaDING is designed for detecting small (single-exon) copy number variations (CNVs) in high-coverage next-generation sequencing (NGS) gene panel data, offering high sensitivity for clinical diagnostics.

tools.name: combiSV
tools.one_line_profile: Tool to combine structural variation calls from long-read sequencing
tools.detailed_description: combiSV integrates structural variation (SV) calls from multiple long-read callers (like Sniffles, PBSV) to create a superior, consensus SV call set, improving recall and precision.

tools.name: exomecnv
tools.one_line_profile: Nextflow pipeline for calling exome CNVs
tools.detailed_description: A bioinformatics pipeline built with Nextflow for detecting Copy Number Variations (CNVs) from exome sequencing data, automating the analysis workflow.

tools.name: structural
tools.one_line_profile: Best-practice pipeline for SV, CNV, and RRE calling from short reads
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive Nextflow pipeline for calling Structural Variants (SVs), Copy Number Variants (CNVs), and Repeat Region Expansions (RREs) from short-read DNA sequencing data, following best practices.

tools.name: V-SVA
tools.one_line_profile: R Shiny app for detecting hidden variation in scRNA-seq data
tools.detailed_description: V-SVA is an interactive R Shiny application that performs Surrogate Variable Analysis (SVA) to detect and annotate hidden sources of variation (e.g., batch effects) in single-cell RNA-seq data.

tools.name: cnvPlotteR
tools.one_line_profile: Plotting functions for CNV data from CNV-Seq and Control-FREEC
tools.detailed_description: An R package providing advanced plotting functions to visualize Copy Number Variation (CNV) data generated by tools like CNV-Seq and Control-FREEC.

tools.name: svParser
tools.one_line_profile: Tool to explore and filter structural variant calls from Lumpy and Delly
tools.detailed_description: A Perl-based utility for parsing, filtering, and exploring structural variant (SV) calls in VCF format produced by callers like Lumpy and Delly.

tools.name: FindCSV
tools.one_line_profile: Long-read based method for detecting complex structural variations
tools.detailed_description: FindCSV is a computational method designed to detect complex structural variations (CSVs) using long-read sequencing data.

tools.name: rna-seq-diff-exprn
tools.one_line_profile: Comprehensive RNA-Seq differential expression and SV analysis pipeline
tools.detailed_description: A pipeline for RNA-Seq data analysis that performs genome coverage calculation, differential expression analysis (DESeq, NOISeq), structural variant detection (SVDetect), and differential exon usage analysis.

tools.name: exvar
tools.one_line_profile: R Package for Gene Expression and Genetic Variation Analysis
tools.detailed_description: exvar is an R package developed for the analysis and visualization of gene expression data alongside genetic variations, including SNPs, Indels, and CNVs.

tools.name: GSSplayground
tools.one_line_profile: Lightweight web-based tool for visualizing genome segments and features
tools.detailed_description: GSSplayground is a single-file HTML tool for visualizing genome features, synteny, and read mappings (short/long reads). It supports interactive modification of features and visualization of alignments.

tools.name: HiNT
tools.one_line_profile: Hi-C for Copy Number Variation and Translocation detection
tools.detailed_description: HiNT is a computational method for detecting Copy Number Variations (CNVs) and Translocations using Hi-C interaction data, leveraging the spatial organization of the genome.

tools.name: NGMLR
tools.one_line_profile: Long-read mapper for structural variation detection
tools.detailed_description: NGMLR is a long-read mapper designed to align PacBio or Oxford Nanopore reads to a reference genome with a specific focus on accurately mapping reads that span structural variations.

tools.name: rCNV
tools.one_line_profile: R package for detecting copy number variants from SNP data
tools.detailed_description: rCNV is an R package designed to detect Copy Number Variants (CNVs) using data from Single Nucleotide Polymorphisms (SNPs), facilitating genetic variation analysis.

tools.name: VisCap
tools.one_line_profile: Inference and visualization tool for germline copy number variants (CNVs)
tools.detailed_description: VisCap is a software program designed for clinical laboratories to infer and visualize germline copy number variants (CNVs) from targeted next-generation sequencing data. It aids in the analysis of targeted capture sequencing for detecting copy number changes.

tools.name: svgling
tools.one_line_profile: Python library for drawing linguistics trees to SVG
tools.detailed_description: svgling is a pure Python package for rendering linguistics tree diagrams (syntax trees) as SVG images. It is designed for use in Jupyter notebooks and supports integration with various linguistic libraries.

tools.name: reconCNV
tools.one_line_profile: Visualization tool for CNV data from targeted capture sequencing
tools.detailed_description: reconCNV is a Python-based tool for visualizing Copy Number Variation (CNV) data derived from targeted capture-based sequencing. It helps researchers inspect and interpret CNV calls visually.

tools.name: iAnnotateSV
tools.one_line_profile: Toolkit to annotate and visualize structural variants from NGS data
tools.detailed_description: iAnnotateSV is a Python library and command-line toolkit designed to annotate and visualize structural variants (SVs) detected from Next Generation DNA sequencing data. It provides detailed annotations to help interpret the functional impact of SVs.

tools.name: ProcaryaSV
tools.one_line_profile: Ensemble structural variant calling pipeline for prokaryotic genomes
tools.detailed_description: ProcaryaSV is an ensemble structural variant calling pipeline driven by Snakemake. It integrates multiple SV and CNV callers to improve detection accuracy in prokaryotic genomes.

tools.name: samplot
tools.one_line_profile: Structural variant signal visualization for BAMs and CRAMs
tools.detailed_description: samplot is a command-line tool for plotting structural variant signals from many BAM and CRAM files. It creates images that display the read depth and alignment characteristics supporting SV calls, facilitating manual review and curation.

tools.name: blender-mantaflow
tools.one_line_profile: Mantaflow fluid simulation integration for Blender
tools.detailed_description: This repository contains the integration of the Mantaflow fluid simulation framework into Blender. It enables advanced fluid dynamics simulations (smoke, fire, liquid) within the Blender environment for scientific visualization and graphics.

tools.name: FuSViz
tools.one_line_profile: Web-based visualization tool for genomic structural variations
tools.detailed_description: FuSViz is a web-browser application designed to visualize, interpret, and prioritize genomic and transcriptomic structural variations (SVs) across multiple samples. It aids in the analysis of complex SV events.

tools.name: kmerSV
tools.one_line_profile: Visualization and annotation tool for structural variants
tools.detailed_description: kmerSV is a tool for the visualization and annotation of structural variants (SVs). It leverages k-mer information to assist in the analysis of genomic structural variations.

tools.name: panz-SV-pipe
tools.one_line_profile: Structural variant calling and genotyping pipeline for pan-Zea
tools.detailed_description: panz-SV-pipe provides scripts for structural variant (SV) calling and genotyping, specifically tailored for pan-Zea (maize) genomic studies. It facilitates population-scale SV analysis.

tools.name: ximmer
tools.one_line_profile: CNV calling system for exome and targeted genomic sequencing
tools.detailed_description: Ximmer is a system designed for Copy Number Variation (CNV) calling on exome and targeted genomic sequencing data. It integrates multiple CNV calling methods and provides a framework for analysis.

tools.name: EvalSVcallers
tools.one_line_profile: Evaluation tool for structural variation callers
tools.detailed_description: EvalSVcallers is a tool to evaluate the performance (precision and recall) of various structural variation (SV) callers. It is used for benchmarking and validating SV detection methods.

tools.name: TRsv
tools.one_line_profile: Detection of tandem repeat variations and SVs using long reads
tools.detailed_description: TRsv is a tool for detecting tandem repeat copy number variations (TR-CNVs) and structural variations (SVs) using long-read sequencing data. It addresses the challenge of analyzing repetitive regions in genomes.

tools.name: svviz
tools.one_line_profile: Read visualizer for structural variants
tools.detailed_description: svviz is a tool for visualizing high-throughput sequencing reads supporting structural variants. It realigns reads to the reference and variant alleles to provide clear visual evidence of SVs.

tools.name: mantaflow
tools.one_line_profile: Open-source framework for fluid simulation research
tools.detailed_description: mantaflow is an open-source framework targeted at fluid simulation research in Computer Graphics and Machine Learning. It provides a versatile environment for developing and testing fluid dynamics algorithms.

tools.name: cuteSV
tools.one_line_profile: Long-read based human genomic structural variation detection
tools.detailed_description: cuteSV is a fast and accurate structural variation (SV) detection tool designed for long-read sequencing data (PacBio/ONT). It uses a stepwise refinement strategy to identify various types of SVs.

tools.name: ngsParalog
tools.one_line_profile: Copy number variation detection using NGS data
tools.detailed_description: ngsParalog is a tool for detecting copy number variations (CNVs) using Next-Generation Sequencing (NGS) data. It is designed to handle read depth information to infer copy numbers.

tools.name: iCopyDAV
tools.one_line_profile: Integrated platform for Copy Number Variation detection, annotation, and visualization
tools.detailed_description: iCopyDAV is an integrated platform designed for the comprehensive analysis of Copy Number Variations (CNVs). It combines detection, annotation, and visualization functionalities into a single workflow.

tools.name: vortex-auv-simulator
tools.one_line_profile: AUV simulator extension for UUV-Simulator
tools.detailed_description: vortex-auv-simulator is an extension of the UUV-Simulator, designed for simulating Autonomous Underwater Vehicles (AUVs). It is used in robotics research for testing control algorithms and vehicle dynamics.

tools.name: surpyvor
tools.one_line_profile: Python wrapper for SURVIVOR structural variant tool
tools.detailed_description: surpyvor is a Python wrapper around the SURVIVOR tool, facilitating the manipulation, merging, and comparison of structural variant (SV) calls (VCF files) within Python workflows.

tools.name: CNVar
tools.one_line_profile: Knowledge-based copy number variation detection tool using maximum likelihood
tools.detailed_description: CNVar is a tool for accurate copy number variation (CNV) detection based on maximum likelihood estimation. It utilizes a knowledge-based approach to improve detection accuracy in high-throughput sequencing data.

tools.name: duet
tools.one_line_profile: SNP-assisted structural variant calling and phasing using ONT data
tools.detailed_description: Duet is a tool designed for structural variant (SV) calling and phasing using Oxford Nanopore Technologies (ONT) sequencing data. It leverages Single Nucleotide Polymorphisms (SNPs) to assist in the accurate identification and phasing of structural variants.

tools.name: TentacleSV
tools.one_line_profile: Snakemake-based workflow for structural variant analysis
tools.detailed_description: TentacleSV is a structural variant analysis workflow built on Snakemake. It leverages the capabilities of OctopusV to facilitate automated and reproducible SV analysis pipelines.

tools.name: CODEX2
tools.one_line_profile: Full-spectrum copy number variation detection and normalization
tools.detailed_description: CODEX2 is a statistical framework and R package for full-spectrum copy number variation (CNV) detection from high-throughput DNA sequencing data. It addresses normalization and system noise to improve CNV calling accuracy.

tools.name: smartie-sv
tools.one_line_profile: Structural variant caller for Blasr contig alignments
tools.detailed_description: Smartie-sv is a tool designed to call structural variants (SVs) from contig-level alignments generated by Blasr. It is particularly useful for analyzing long-read assembly alignments.

tools.name: iCNV
tools.one_line_profile: Integrated copy number variation detection toolset
tools.detailed_description: iCNV is an integrated toolset for copy number variation detection. It combines data from multiple platforms or sequencing depths to improve the sensitivity and specificity of CNV calls.
